parameters.query: SELECT id, workflow_name, state, failure_count, last_failure_at, opened_at, next_attempt_at FROM circuit_breaker_state WHERE workflow_name = $1;

INSERT INTO circuit_breaker_state (id, workflow_name, state, failure_count, last_failure_at, opened_at, next_attempt_at, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), $1, 'OPEN', 1, NOW(), NOW(), NOW() + INTERVAL '60 seconds', NOW(), NOW()) ON CONFLICT (workflow_name) DO UPDATE SET state = 'OPEN', failure_count = circuit_breaker_state.failure_count + 1, last_failure_at = NOW(), opened_at = NOW(), next_attempt_at = NOW() + INTERVAL '60 seconds', updated_at = NOW() WHERE circuit_breaker_state.workflow_name = $1 RETURNING *;

INSERT INTO circuit_breaker_state (id, workflow_name, state, failure_count, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), $1, 'CLOSED', 0, NOW(), NOW()) ON CONFLICT (workflow_name) DO UPDATE SET state = 'CLOSED', failure_count = 0, updated_at = NOW() WHERE circuit_breaker_state.workflow_name = $1 RETURNING *;
